name: Understanding Climate Change: Questioning Beliefs, Myths and Facts
description:
Climate change and climate action have entered into the vocabulary of our daily lives. Yet beyond making posters and talking about tokenistic solutions we still know little about it. The ‘Understanding Climate Change: Questioning Beliefs, Myths and Facts’ workshop is a gamified way for students to question beliefs, myths and facts and develop an enhanced understanding of the topic. The intention of this workshop is to move beyond the buzzwords and cliches and get initiated into understanding not only how climate change affects us but how we can create impact at personal and societal levels.

This workshop will organised on two different days. The contents of the workshop will be repeated on both days.

This programme is supported by the American Centre Chennai.

name: We are Mediators, of course we…
description:
Come meet the CARBON mediators for one last time! Join us
as we bid adieu to our first ever team of full-time mediators. Let's
go down the memory lane of the CARBON exhibition and listen to the
memories of the ones that made your gallery experience meaningful.
Engage with them as they present their experiences — mediation and
beyond through flash talks and activities. Come, pick their brains
about anything!
